author: geirm
msg: Added support for template-local inline VMs - needed to send a context down the AST in the init().

author: geirm
msg: Added support for template-local inline VMs.  Needed to send a real context down the AST via init() to set the template name.

author: geirm
msg: Class to manage VM namespaces for template-scope inline VMs.  Will support general namespaces, but now is *only* for the inlineVM feature.

author: geirm
msg: Added support for template-scope inline VMs.  Move VM management to a VMManager class, and modified the addVM() gating rules.

author: geirm
msg: Support for template-scope inline VMs.  Altered VM factory wrapper routines, and added new wrapper routine to dump a <cough> namespace.
